page.title: 04BUILDINGS OF INTEREST
page.content: In Uplowman there is a church with a tower and six bells ,it is a{ST.PETERS {CHURCH. There is a school with 21 childrenin the junior class and 12 in the infant class. There is a pub called 'The Redwoods inn' which used to be called the crossways inn. There is a river going through the village called the Lowman,we have a shop which is a combined post office and it is a fairly old building. You can get to Uplowman by coming off the M5. Uplowman is near Sampford Peverell and Tiverton. There are 8 council houses and lots of other houses .But Uplowmanis only a small village and the country side is very nice.
